title: SCP-DTBMH-J
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@
[[collapsible show="+ DOCUMENTS RESTRICTED UNDER LEVEL 5 CLEARANCE. ENTER CREDENTIALS." hide="- LOGIN DETAILS FLAGGED FOR ADDITIONAL REVIEW"]]


[[div class="blockquote"]]
You are attempting to access highly classified information. While your credentials match, the system has deemed you a 
[[=]]
##red|SUSPICIOUS CHARACTER - NON-FOUNDATION OPERATIVE LIKELY##[[/=]]

As such, please re-enter your credentials, beginning with the following:
[[/div]]


[[=]]
**Name**
**Age**
**Personnel ID**
[[/=]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Name accepted.
Age accepted.
##red|"65791876108" is not a valid Personnel ID number (must be 12 digits).##
Personnel ID 657918761108 accepted. 
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
The file you are attempting to access contains a memetic hazard. To continue, answer the following question:
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]
Does the black moon howl?
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
"what" is not a valid answer. Please try again. 
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]
Does the black moon howl?
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
"yes" is not a valid answer. Please try again. 
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]
Does the black moon howl?
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
"##red|no##" is not a valid answer. Please try again. 
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]
Does the black moon howl?
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
"fuckfuckfuckfuck" is not a valid answer. Please try again. 
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]
Does the black moon howl?
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
"password" is not a valid answer. Please try again. 
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]
Does the black moon howl?
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
"password!" is not a valid answer. Please try again. 
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]
Does the black moon howl?
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
"the moon is white, dumbass" is not a valid answer. Please try again. 
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]
Does the black moon howl?
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
"No but it mumbles a bit" is not a valid answer. Please try again.
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]
Does the black moon howl?
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
"its a man in the moon its not even a wolf" is not a valid answer. Please try again. 
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]
Does the black moon howl?
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
"FUCK YOU" is not a valid answer. Please try again.
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]
Does the black moon howl?
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
"No but it barks at the tv when there's a dog on it" is not a valid answer. 
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]
Does the black moon howl?
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
"Yes" is not a valid answer. Please try again.
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]
Does the black moon howl?
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
"Only when heard by those who have given their lives and souls to saving the unsaved, and damning the damned" is close, but is not a valid answer. Please try again. 
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]
Does the black moon howl?
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
"Yes!" is not a valid answer. Please try again. 
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]
Does the black moon howl?
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[=]]
[[size 250%]]...[[/size]]

[[size 250%]]...[[/size]]

[[size 250%]]...[[/size]]

[[size 250%]]...[[/size]]

[[size 250%]]...[[/size]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@
[[div class="blockquote"]]
You have now been apprehended by MTF Lupis-3 ("Wolf Whisperers") that was dispatched after the third incorrect answer triggered an alert. Thank you for complying with the Foundation stalling mechanism. 

To deactivate the alert, please contact an actual member of the Foundation to input the correct answer.

Enjoy your interrogation, and have a great day!
[[/div]]


[[=]]
[[size 250%]]...[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
Credentials received for MTF Lupis-3 leader. Please answer the following question:
[[/div]]

[[=]]
[[size 150%]]
Does the black moon howl?
[[/size]]
[[size 250%]]...[[/size]]
[[size 250%]]...[[/size]]
[[size 250%]]...[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
"##green|arooooo##"
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 250%]]...[[/size]]
[[size 250%]]...[[/size]]
[[size 250%]]...[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
Credentials verified, alert deactivated. Thank you!
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]

@@ @@

author: TheyCallMeTim
